meanings.definition: Officially recognized as possessing certain qualifications or meeting certain standards.
meanings.sent1: The mechanic was certified to fix cars.
meanings.sent2: She bought a certified pre-owned car.
meanings.sent3: The certified chef accidentally burned the toast.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as bright as a certified diamond.
meanings.sent5: The certified lifeguard saved the drowning swimmer.

meanings.definition: Guaranteed or endorsed as authentic or genuine.
meanings.sent1: He only bought certified organic produce.
meanings.sent2: The document had a certified stamp of approval.
meanings.sent3: The certified watch stopped working after one day.
meanings.sent4: His laughter was as genuine as a certified smile.
meanings.sent5: The certified artist's painting was indistinguishable from a photograph.
